mapper.select: SELECT COURSE.COURSE_INDEX, COURSE_NO, COURSE_NAME FROM COURSE LEFT JOIN COURSE_FILE ON (COURSE.COURSE_INDEX = COURSE_FILE.COURSE_INDEX) ORDER BY COURSE_INDEX ASC

SELECT C.COURSE_INDEX, COURSE_NO, COURSE_NAME, START_END, TAKE_TIME, DISTANCE, CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_LEVEL FROM COURSE C LEFT JOIN COURSE_FILE F ON (C.COURSE_INDEX = F.COURSE_INDEX) WHERE C.COURSE_INDEX = #{courseIndex}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO COURSE_FILE F USING DUAL ON (F.COURSE_INDEX = #{courseIndex} AND F.FILE_LEVEL = #{fileLevel} ) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( FILE_NO, COURSE_INDEX, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_COURSE_IMG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{courseIndex}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{fileLevel} )
